meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bill Popper Molly McGowan Richard Mason Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4131.

td.p: Bill Popper, a writer from Burnsville, North Carolina
Molly McGowan, an information specialist from Pottsville, Pennsylvania
Richard Mason, a roboticist from Pasadena, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $50,600)

tr.td: FUN IN THE CITY
NO. 1 BROTHERS
HOLIDAYS & OBSERVANCES
"GR"ANIMALS
MEASURING UP
PICTURESQUE EXPRESSIONS

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Richard: What is Edmonton?)

Calgary

RichardBill
Triple Stumper
')

(Jimmy of the Clue Crew presents from the Palace Hotel.) This Italian tenor was staying
here at the Palace Hotel
when the San Francisco
earthquake hit in 1906.
He fled in a towel,
vowing never to return.
